summary: A test suite that exercises the Windows Remote Registry (RRP) service, verifying that operations such as opening hives, creating and deleting keys, enumerating subkeys and values, setting and querying data, managing security descriptors, and loading, unloading, saving and restoring registry hives behave correctly.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the RRP API to ensure reliable remote registry management for system administration, automation, and security tools.
